Shіt game. Spin botters, smurfs, griefers, bans for griefing because of salty enemies. Good maps removed so they could add every brain damaged players' favorite map, Ancient. Stabbing yourself to get light headed from blood loss is more fun. It's like there's an inside joke at valve to see how bad they can make the game before people realize that it's intentional.

Skill based game prioritises queue times over actually matching you to your skill group especially when it comes to group queuing. Also before you can get a skill group you have to go through an agonising process where it pretends you are the top rank and so it's not beginner friendly at all. Noncompetitive is a joke because the lobby size is too big for anyone to have an enjoyable time, far too much noise and you might as well install COD at that point. Also a very toxic community in general. So basically don't play unless you are already a pro at this game's very specific unrealistic mechanics.
Good game, was not playing for 3 years but when come back was very happy, sadly too much cheaters :(((

Para hacer unas milanesas de carne
Ingredientes:

4 Bifes para milanesa
1 Diente de ajo
3 Cucharadas de perejil picado
2 Cucharadas de Savora
3 Huevos
3 Cucharadas de queso rallado
2 Cucharadas orégano seco
Pan rallado c/n
Puré de papas
Paso a paso:

1 En un bowl, mezclá los huevos con Savora, ajo, perejil, queso rallado, orégano, sal y pimienta
2 Pasá las milanesas por la mezcla y luego por pan rallado.
3 Agregale agua o leche a los huevos y pasá n uevamente las milanesas por la mezcla
No está mal el juego, pero por lo que ofrece no lo volvería a pagar, jugaría Valorant que es gratis, y personalmente lo disfruto más
很简单的休闲游戏，适合手残党放心游玩，坐牢设计很精美，队友压力也很可爱
